entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:32 p.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 3:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: NE 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to periods of snow and ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
